name: A Night Around The Fire Post Jam
name_original: A Night Around The Fire Post Jam
description:
Having a lovely time around the camp fire. Sweet memories are made on nights like this. But this dream is about to turn into a nightmare…

Left mouse button or space bar nothing more. Hold to hide, tap to spot obsticles, release to run.

Running in straight lines is easy yeah? Going in circles would be very very bad... you would not want to get stuck in a loop.

This Post Jam was released an hour before LD47 results were announced. Lots changed in those 3 weeks. Better art, better sound and more to do. What will be next for this lad? Maybe an ending or eternal death forever, watch this space.

Windows version most stable at this time.
